abstract: A 90-minute edition of “Dancing With the Stars” earned 17.8 million on Monday, enough to make ABC the most watched network for the night despite trailing in the ratings from 9:30 to 11 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: A 90-minute edition of “Dancing With the Stars” earned 17.8 million on Monday, enough to make ABC the most watched network for the night despite trailing in the ratings from 9:30 to 11 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.

headline.main: Ratings: President Bush Boosts Ratings (Not His)
